# Investor Relations

[Latest News](/news-releases/news-release-details/murano-announces-closing-us300-million-offering-senior-secured)

## Overview

Murano Global Investments Plc (Nasdaq: MRNO) is a UK headquartered real estate company that owns, develops and invests in hotel, resort and commercial properties throughout Mexico. Over the last 30+ years, Murano’s experienced management team has completed 10 projects throughout 6 cities in Mexico, and has over 3,700 keys in development. Our expertise is in large-scale real estate projects with a focus on capturing value at all stages of the real estate cycle.

Murano’s portfolio includes the Hotel Andaz (operated by Hyatt) and Hotel Mondrian (operated by Accor) in Mexico City, as well as luxury projects under development in Cancun (with the 1,000 room Grand Island I hotel project opening across Q2 and Q3 2024 under the Vivid and Dreams brands and operated by Hyatt) and Bajamar, positioning the company to capitalize on the country’s strong travel and tourism fundamentals. With an established track record and vast network of industry and brand relationships, Murano is poised for sustained growth.

## Sustainability

Murano is committed to upholding and promoting our core values through proactive environmental management initiatives, social management, strong governance, and community care. We are committed to transparency and accountability to our stakeholders, and to providing ongoing updates on the outcome and impact of our social, environmental, and institutional actions.
